title: Telekinesis
content:
Telekinesis Level 5 Transmutation Spell Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot. Heavier items deal more damage. 10 turns 18m STR Save Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Transmutation Spell

Throw a creature or object up to 18m with a thought. Once per turn, you can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot.

Heavier items deal more damage.

18m STR Save Concentration
